PerfectNetExp.abs: ...引起细菌性巩膜炎的常见致病菌有：假单孢菌科(pseudomonadaceae)的假单孢菌(pseudomonas)、链球菌属(streptococcaceae)的链球菌(streptococcus)、细球菌科(micrococcaceae)的葡萄球菌(staphylococcus)和肠道菌群(enterobacteriaceae)的变形杆菌(proteus)等。巩膜异物、眼部手术(图1～4)或术后β射线照射、局部应用免疫抑制药物及.

means.word_mean: 1. spherical or elliptical usually aerobic eubacteria that produce yellow or orange or red pigment; includes toxin-producing forms as well as harmless commensals and saprophytes
